message.content:
cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.CL, cs.CV, cs.NE 

This paper proposes a novel learning framework that combines perception and reasoning, which are fundamental abilities in artificial intelligence. Therefore, it is likely to belong to the sub-categories of cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.LG (Machine Learning). The paper also mentions the use of language experts to decode Mayan scripts, which suggests a connection to natural language processing (NLP) and thus the sub-category of cs.CL (Computation and Language). Additionally, the paper uses handwritten equations as an example, which suggests a connection to computer vision (CV) and thus the sub-category of cs.CV (Computer Vision). Finally, the paper mentions the use of a Neural-Logical Machine, which suggests a connection to neural networks (NN) and thus the sub-category of cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing).
